channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2025 Heisman Trophy Odds: Julian Sayin, Fernando Mendoza Lead the Way
item.description: Two Big Ten quarterbacks are leading the way as Heisman favorites. Here are the latest odds.

item.title: Matthew Stafford 'Did It All' to Help Rams Take Down 49ers, Win LFG Player of the Game
item.description: Matthew Stafford looked the part of an MVP in the Rams' win on Sunday, helping him win a different award.

item.title: Tom Brady's LFG Player of the Game: Rams QB Matthew Stafford üèÜ Week 10 DIGITAL EXCLUSIVE
item.description: Tom Brady awards Los Angeles Rams QB Matthew Stafford with the LFG Player of the Game after his four touchdown performance against the San Francisco 4...

item.title: When Will Dart, Daniels, Purdy Return? Glazer Gives Latest on Injured QBs
item.description: Jay Glazer shared some encouraging updates on Jaxson Dart and Brock Purdy along with a timeline for Jayden Daniels.

item.title: Baker Mayfield Hopes Buccaneers Get 'Pissed Off' After Loss to Patriots
item.description: The Bucs quarterback issued a stern message to his teammates following Sunday's home loss to New England.

item.title: Follow live: Chargers host Steelers in Sunday night clash
Legendary NBA player, coach Wilkens dies at 88
item.description: Lenny Wilkens, a smooth playmaker who was inducted into the Basketball Hall of Fame as both a player and a coach, has died. He was 88.

item.title: Tiering all 32 NFL teams by their playoff chances: Where do Packers, Colts, Raiders, Cowboys and Seahawks land?
item.description: We put all 32 NFL teams into tiers based on their likelihood of making the postseason, from the Super Bowl favorites to the top draft pick candidates.

item.title: 15 NFL experts, 15 midseason predictions: We made our best calls for tight playoff races
item.description: Can the Bucs reach the Super Bowl? Will Myles Garrett win DPOY?

item.title: Guardians' Clase, Ortiz indicted for pitch rigging
item.description: Cleveland Guardians pitchers Emmanuel Clase and Luis Ortiz have been indicted on a host of charges related to an alleged scheme to rig bets on pitches...
